title: Somethin’s Cookin’
description: Roger babysits Baby Herman, who is determined to get to the cookie jar on top of the refrigerator. Roger better keep that baby safe or he’s going back to the science lab!
quote: Boy, it’s dark in here. Don’t they pay the electricity?
altHero: Roger Rabbit splayed against a wall surrounded by knives, forks, and corkscrews stuck in the wall
alt1: Baby Herman escapes from his pen
alt2: Roger screams, his eyes bulging from his face
alt3: Baby Herman crawls across a stove, lighting each burner as he goes
alt4: Roger’s mouth is attached to a Suck-O-Lux vacuum hose and his body is filling with air
